item.title: Christy add a quote by John Darnielle
item.description: "When you punish a person for dreaming his dream Don't expect him to thank or forgive you." -- John Darnielle

item.title: Christy add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Whereas story is processed in the mind in a straightforward manner, poetry bypasses rational thought and goes straight to the limbic system and lights it up like a brushfire. It's the crack cocaine of the literary world." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Christy add a quote by Leslie Marmon Silko
item.description: "I will tell you something about stories . . . They aren't just entertainment. Don't be fooled. They are all we have, you see, all we have to fight off illness and death." -- Leslie Marmon Silko

item.title: Christy add a quote by Sherman Alexie
item.description: "Imagination is the politics of dreams; imagination turns every word into a bottle rocket. . . . Imagine every day is Independence Day and save us from traveling the river changed; save us from hitchhiking the long road home. Imagine an escape. Imagine that your own shadow on the wall is a perfect door. Imagine a song stronger than penicillin. Imagine a spring with water that mends broken bones. Imagine a drum which wraps itself around your heart. Imagine a story that puts wood in the fireplace." -- Sherman Alexie

item.title: Christy add a quote by Tim O'Brien
item.description: "That's what fiction is for. It's for getting at the truth when the truth isn't sufficient for the truth." -- Tim O'Brien

item.title: Christy add a quote by Mary Shelley
item.description: "Beware; for I am fearless, and therefore powerful." -- Mary Shelley
